languages.text: "Магнэ Ацессио была достойной избранни{mf|ка|цы} Императора. Но я рада, что мы покинули безопасные стены и вновь стремимся в пыл битвы!"
"The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"
languages.original_text: "Магнэ Ацессио была достойной избранни{mf|ка|цы} Императора. Но я рада, что мы покинули безопасные стены и вновь стремимся в пыл битвы!"

traits.locale_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"

traits.locale_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “这场继任颂典很符合帝皇神选者的身份。不过我很高兴，我们终于不用继续躲在安全的高墙后面，可以重新踏入激烈的战场了！”
languages.original_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"

traits.locale_text: “这场继任颂典很符合帝皇神选者的身份。不过我很高兴，我们终于不用继续躲在安全的高墙后面，可以重新踏入激烈的战场了！”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « La Magnae Accessio était digne de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur, mais je dois dire que je ne suis pas mécontente d'avoir quitté la sécurité des murs de ce palais et de retourner au cœur de la mêlée ! »
languages.original_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"

traits.locale_text: « La Magnae Accessio était digne de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur, mais je dois dire que je ne suis pas mécontente d'avoir quitté la sécurité des murs de ce palais et de retourner au cœur de la mêlée ! »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «La Magnae Accessio fue digna de{mf|l| la} elegid{mf|o|a} del Emperador, ¡pero me alegro de dejar atrás la seguridad de los muros para adentrarnos en el fragor de la batalla!».
languages.original_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"

traits.locale_text: «La Magnae Accessio fue digna de{mf|l| la} elegid{mf|o|a} del Emperador, ¡pero me alegro de dejar atrás la seguridad de los muros para adentrarnos en el fragor de la batalla!».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「マグナ・アクセッシオは皇帝に選ばれし者にふさわしい式典だった。だが、安全な壁をあとにして今一度、熱き戦場に乗り込めたことが喜ばしい！」
languages.original_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"

traits.locale_text: 「マグナ・アクセッシオは皇帝に選ばれし者にふさわしい式典だった。だが、安全な壁をあとにして今一度、熱き戦場に乗り込めたことが喜ばしい！」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Die Magnae Accessio war {mf|einer|eines} Auserwählten des Imperators würdig. Aber ich bin froh, dass wir die sicheren Wände hinter uns gelassen haben und wieder mitten in die Schlacht ziehen!"
languages.original_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Die Magnae Accessio war {mf|einer|eines} Auserwählten des Imperators würdig. Aber ich bin froh, dass wir die sicheren Wände hinter uns gelassen haben und wieder mitten in die Schlacht ziehen!"
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"

languages.text: "Magnae Accessio, İmparator'un Seçilmişi'ne layıktı. Fakat güvenli duvarları arkamızda bıraktığımız ve bir kez daha savaşın ateşine kararlılıkla yürüdüğümüz için mutluyum."
languages.original_text: "The Magnae Accessio was worthy of the Emperor's chosen. But I am glad that we have left safe walls behind us and are once again striding into the heat of battle!"

traits.locale_text: "Magnae Accessio, İmparator'un Seçilmişi'ne layıktı. Fakat arkamızda güvenli duvarlar bıraktığımız ve bir kez daha savaşın ateşine kararlılıkla yürüdüğümüz için mutluyum."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
